pending_1.name: pending_1
pending_1.description: Set to 1 if interrupt source 1 is pending, regardless of its enable or priority setting.
pending_1.groupDesc: Pending Bit Array. 1 Bit for each interrupt source.

pending_2.description: Set to 1 if interrupt source 2 is pending, regardless of its enable or priority setting.
pending_2.groupDesc: Pending Bit Array. 1 Bit for each interrupt source.

enables_0.name: enables_0
enables_0.description: Targets 1-7. Set bits to 1 if interrupt should be enabled.
enables_0.groupDesc: Enable bits for each interrupt source for target 0. 1 bit for each interrupt source.

enables_1.name: enables_1
enables_1.description: Targets 8-8. Set bits to 1 if interrupt should be enabled.
enables_1.groupDesc: Enable bits for each interrupt source for target 0. 1 bit for each interrupt source.

threshold_0.name: threshold_0
threshold_0.description: Interrupt & claim threshold for target 0. Maximum value is 7.

claim_complete_0.name: claim_complete_0
claim_complete_0.description: Claim/Complete register for Target 0. Reading this register returns the claimed interrupt number and makes it no longer pending.Writing the interrupt number back completes the interrupt.

threshold_1.description: Interrupt & claim threshold for target 1. Maximum value is 7.
